description: Applecart Arts moved into the building and began an extensive refurbishment, opening the site to the public as a creative arts hub. The site now provides a home for a theatre, cafe, exhibition, rehearsal, and artist studio spaces.

factsheet.heading: Applecart Arts Today
paragraphs:
In 2021 Applecart Arts took over the building, saving it from closure and demolition, now hosting a wide range of artistic disciplines.
We work with a wide range of artistic disciplines â€“ creating original music, film, visual art and drama. We combine this with our long-standing commitment to community engagement and pursuit of artistic excellence.
We aim to reach across cultural divides and tell stories which engage, inspire and entertain our audiences.

name: Applecart Arts
